text: SEMIO DAILY: Joanne McNeil (who not only has a great newsletter but also runs a very good Philip K. Dick book club on Slack) wrote an interesting thing about the evolution of criticism (of the literary / artistic type) and the pace of the web: <http://tinyletter.com/jomc/letters/everyone-s-a-critic>

attachments.title: Everyone's a critic
attachments.text: I began the week reading Manny Farber reviews. Heâ€™s a tricky writer and this baroque style of writing feels especially unusual since reviewing is so expository these days. I'd get a little bit lost ...
